ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “I believe only what I say.
Because I never lie to myself.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “Hmph……!
Everything President Shinra
says is a lie.”{PAUSE}“But you can't trust
that AVALANCHE, or whatever you call them.”{PAUSE}“You can bat it around all you like,
but it all comes down to wanting to
live like the people up there.”{PAUSE}“So who do I believe in?
Myself! Me!
I never lie to myself, that's for sure!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “The hell's up with that!? I don't care if
they're AVALANCHE or Avant-garde or
whatever. Anyone who'd bring
the plates down on us is nuts!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // “And what's with the new president
of Shinra, Inc.?”{PAUSE}“Hell, even the old president was better
than him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // “SOLDIER?
What about them!?”{PAUSE}“Damn! If they're really from SOLDIER,
they should be doing something
about all this!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “And now for the news.”{PAUSE}“A terrorist attack by the group called
AVALANCHE has parts of Midgar
temporarily out of power, but they
will be restored momentarily.”{PAUSE}“Following President Shinra's address,
Mayor Domino also spoke out today
against AVALANCHE.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “Now for the weather.”{PAUSE}“Tomorrow's weather will be overcast
most of the day,”{PAUSE}“with a slight chance of
showers in parts of the city.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “This just in. An accident today…”{PAUSE}“…the worst in the history of the metropolis.
But thanks to the quick response
by those in charge,
there were no civilian casualties.”{PAUSE}“The cause of the accident is still unclear at
this time, however, according to some
sources it is believed to have something to
do with the terrorist
group, AVALANCHE.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // “Citizens, unite!
Come to the light, Mako energy.”{PAUSE}“Power is Truth
Shinra is the future.
Real happiness can be found
in obedience to the company!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // “What your car is missing is…”{PAUSE}“…a set of PTZ2000 tires!!”{PAUSE}“That's right, PTZ2000,
good for your car and
they look good, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // “Shinra, Inc…Providing piece of mind in
your busy life in everything from
can openers to Mako energy.”

ops.raw: d0 6d ff 50 00 01 ff 8e ff bc 00 01 ff

dialogStrings:
Uh, test, test…
This is a dummy message.
A test. Is it coming through?

“Hmph……!
Everything President Shinra
says is a lie.”{PAUSE}“But you can't trust
that AVALANCHE, or whatever you call them.”{PAUSE}“You can bat it around all you like,
but it all comes down to wanting to
live like the people up there.”{PAUSE}“So who do I believe in?
Myself! Me!
I never lie to myself, that's for sure!”

“I believe only what I say.
Because I never lie to myself.”

“And what's with the new president
of Shinra, Inc.?”{PAUSE}“Hell, even the old president was better
than him.”

“The hell's up with that!? I don't care if
they're AVALANCHE or Avant-garde or
whatever. Anyone who'd bring
the plates down on us is nuts!!”

“SOLDIER?
What about them!?”{PAUSE}“Damn! If they're really from SOLDIER,
they should be doing something
about all this!!”

“Me and my woman were going
for a drive. Or at least we were
supposed to until I had engine
trouble and our plans fizzled.{PAUSE}“Have you ever had that happen?
I hate it when that happens!”{PAUSE}“A new standard in engines…
the 'Shinra V-3000'.
For the best drive
of your car's life!”

“And now for the news.”{PAUSE}“A terrorist attack by the group called
AVALANCHE has parts of Midgar
temporarily out of power, but they
will be restored momentarily.”{PAUSE}“Following President Shinra's address,
Mayor Domino also spoke out today
against AVALANCHE.”

“Now for the weather.”{PAUSE}“Tomorrow's weather will be overcast
most of the day,”{PAUSE}“with a slight chance of
showers in parts of the city.”

“What your car is missing is…”{PAUSE}“…a set of PTZ2000 tires!!”{PAUSE}“That's right, PTZ2000,
good for your car and
they look good, too.”

“Shinra, Inc…Providing piece of mind in
your busy life in everything from
can openers to Mako energy.”

“This just in. An accident today…”{PAUSE}“…the worst in the history of the metropolis.
But thanks to the quick response
by those in charge,
there were no civilian casualties.”{PAUSE}“The cause of the accident is still unclear at
this time, however, according to some
sources it is believed to have something to
do with the terrorist
group, AVALANCHE.”

“Citizens, unite!
Come to the light, Mako energy.”{PAUSE}“Power is Truth
Shinra is the future.
Real happiness can be found
in obedience to the company!”
